DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Dose Proportionality Study Canagliflozin Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label study healthy volunteer know name dose assign treatment randomly assign take single oral ( mouth ) dose canagliflozin sequentially 3 treament period dose treatment period different ( referred 3-period crossover study ) evaluate pharmacokinetics ( blood level ) 3 dose level canagliflozin . Healthy volunteer take single oral tablet canagliflozin 50 mg ( Treatment A ) , 100 mg ( Treatment B ) , 300 mg ( Treatment C ) study ; different dose take treatment period . Study drug take a.m. Day 1 Treatment Periods 1 , 2 , 3 , 10- 14-day washout period Day 1 treatment period . Volunteers fast ( go without food ) least 10 hour least 4 hour take study drug .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) body weight less 50 kg History current medical illness deem clinically significant Investigator ( study physician )
